title: Most amazing challah
ingredients: ['25g quick yeast', '1L warm water (45 degrees C)', '2 tablespoons salt', '150g caster sugar', '225g pareve margarine, melted', '4 eggs', '1700g strong white bread flour, or as needed', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons sesame seeds, divided']
